nodes.title: CRT exposes “the methods by which those who have traditionally been in positions of cultural, political and economic power preserve their influence over time,” says @jasonintrator. That is why it is a “target”, he argues in a guest essay https://t.co/h6DIRjqZ2n
nodes.author: The Economist

CRT揭露了 "那些传统上处于文化、政治和经济权力地位的人是如何长期保持其影响力的"，@Jasonintrator说。这就是为什么它是一个 "目标"，他在一篇客座文章中认为，https://t.co/h6DIRjqZ2n

nodes.title:
What is critical race theory?

We’re taking a deep-dive into how this once obscure academic topic became a new frontline in America’s culture war with a special three-part series on our “Checks and Balance” podcast. 

Join us👇 https://t.co/LcimAtd8dX
nodes.author: The Economist

localize.full_text:
クリティカル・レース・セオリーとは何か？

かつて無名だったこの学問が、いかにしてアメリカの文化戦争における新たな最前線となったのか、「Checks and Balance」ポッドキャストの特別3部作で深く掘り下げます。

ご参加ください👇 https://t.co/LcimAtd8dX

什么是批判性种族理论？

我们将通过 "制衡 "播客的特别三部曲，深入探讨这个曾经晦涩难懂的学术话题如何成为美国文化战争的新前线。

localize.full_text:
